demo

Class DemoUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • demo.DemoUtil

  • public class DemoUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to be used with Demo programs. It defines and handles: a) login params, b) initializes LogManager by reading the logger.properties file c) initializes APPLICATION_KEY settings by reading the config.properties file d) initializes MambuAPIFactory and sets up Application Key parameter Usage: Update domain, user password as needed. Update logger.properties file and config.properties file as needed, All other demo programs must invoke the following static method to use this class: setUp(). E.g. DemoUtil.setUp();
    Author:
    mdanilkis

Use this method to test operations requiring transaction channel, which is present only in transactions supporting transaction details.       • makeDemoPredefinedFees

        public static java.util.List<com.mambu.loans.shared.model.CustomPredefinedFee> makeDemoPredefinedFees(com.mambu.accounts.shared.model.HasPredefinedFees product,
                                                                                                      java.util.Set<DemoUtil.FeeCategory> feeCategories)
        Helper to specify Predefined fees as expected by Mambu API. See MBU-8811, MBU-12272, MBU-12273. Product Fees with pre-defined amounts should NOT have this amount specified in the API request
        Parameters:
        product - loan or savings product
        feeCategories - fee categories
        Returns:
        custom predefined fees from product for the specified fee categories

      • getValueMatchingConstraints

        public static <T> T getValueMatchingConstraints(T defaultValue,
                                                T min,
                                                T max,
                                                T noLimitsValue)
        Helper to return a value to to be within the specified limits. Return a non-null default or a non-null limit value. Return the provided noLimitsValue if no constraints were specified
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - default value
        min - minimum possible value
        max - maximum possible value
        noLimitsValue - value to be returned if no default or limits are defined (all null)
        Returns:
        any non null constraint or noLimitsValue value

      • getValueMatchingConstraints

        public static java.math.BigDecimal getValueMatchingConstraints(com.mambu.accounts.shared.model.DecimalIntervalConstraints constraints,
                                                               java.math.BigDecimal noLimitsValue)
        Helper to return a value to to be within the specified DecimalIntervalConstraints. Return the provided noLimitsValue if no constraints were specified
        Parameters:
        constraints - Decimal Interval Constraints
        noLimitsValue - value to be returned if no constraints
        Returns:
        any non null constraint or noLimitsValue value
